alert.note: Alert for Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Western Antelope Valley Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued September 21 at 8:09AM PDT until September 21 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Antelope Valley Foothills and Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills. * WHEN...Until 9 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The main areas impacted will be the western foothills and especially near Highway 138 and the Pearblossom Highway where noticeable crosswinds will occur.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Antelope Valley Foothills; Western Antelope Valley Foothills
